name: Entities around my house
description:
THIS GAME CONTAINS JUMPSCARES AND LOUD SOUNDS D:!

history:

you're just a dumb kid living in the middle of nowhere, being harassed by demonic entities that just want to eat your lungs, but you don't want that! so you will have to survive for 12 nights (currently, only 2 available) so that the demonic entities realize that you arent allowing them to eat your lungs

Guide of entities:

Smilehead: in the night 1, it appears from time to time in the window, if you see it in the window, hide as soon as possible, if the lights flicker, it means that it already saw you and you are going to die

Doorboi: in the night 1, it approaches the door from time to time, you will know if it is approaching by the sounds of wood it will make, click on the door and then turn on the lights to make it go away, in the night 2 it is very easy to avoid, their eyes appear from time to time in the door and to make it go away you just have to close the door

Plushcat: in the night 1, as the night goes on, it gets bigger, if it reaches their maximum point it will come out from under the bed and kill you, to avoid it just click under the bed and light it

Emojigirl: she will come to the window, you will have to press the window and then close the window if you suspect that she is close, if you don't close the window when she is too close, her head will look out the window and if you close the door or touch the window, she will kill you

Else:

If you find any bug or something like that, please let me know.
